SELECT cc.channel_id,sum(cc.brokerage) brokerage,cm.channel_name,cm.linkman,cm.linkman_tell FROM clearing_manage cc LEFT JOIN channel_manage cm ON cc.channel_id=cm.id_ WHERE cc.`status`=2 AND cc.create_time LIKE '%${create_time}%'
GROUP BY cc.channel_id,cm.channel_name,cm.linkman,cm.linkman_tell
